SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CButton
A Custom Button class.
CLabel
A Custom Label class.
Controller
The Controller class that acts as the middleman between the Model and View classes.
Deluxe
The room type Deluxe, extending from the abstract class: Room.
Executive
The room type Executive, extending from the abstract class: Room.
Hotel
The Hotel class represents a hotel with a name, a room count, and a list of rooms.
Main
The Main class to run the program.
Manager
The Manager class represents a manager with a username and password.
Model
The Model class is responsible for managing the overall operations involving hotels, rooms, and reservations.
Reservation
The Reservation class represents a reservation made by a guest.
Room
The Room class represents a room in a hotel with a name, base price, and a list of reservations.
Standard
The room type Standard, extending from the abstract class: Room.
Utility
The Utility class provides various helper methods for user input and validation.
View
The View class is responsible for the user interface of the application.
